ygData.subject: A question
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail, my paladin brother and sisters. My name is Vilar, a level 8 high elf female paladin, I am new to the class of paladin, can you tell me are there cap for
ygData.messageBody:
Hail, my paladin brother and sisters.

My name is Vilar, a level 8 high elf female paladin, I am new to the class
of paladin, can you tell me are there cap for the combat skills of us
paladin? If not, than is it true that we could fight as good as those
warriors? If there are skill cap for our combat skills, well, the combat
advantage of us would be to obtain a holy sword, am I right?

Hope my question is not stupid, I found most of us paladins are hunger for
the sword, and every paladin guide on the net said that the long turn
advantage of paladin in fight is we can get a holy sword (the most powerful
weapon in game) someday. Well, so far as the creation of Vilar, and I
found myself doing very good in combat and also I am eager to reach level9
to cast spells. However, I just wondering, is it that important to obtain a
holy sword? If every of us get one, well....... I myself prefer to be a
warrior.

I have a vision, sword is what we hold on our hand, but we are not fight
with the one we are swinging, we fight with the sword in our heart and THAT
should be our holy sword................


Vilar
